response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's worth noting that this product is valued at $1,500,000 to you. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this valuable asset at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent investment opportunity. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you need more information to make a decision. I am looking forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 1400000}
